jobDescription: At Solera, we believe in providing clarity and focus to what our volunteers are responsible for – their mission. The 80’s, as we call them at Solera, are the employee’s priorities associated with their role or mission. The mission 80’s for this role, are: Develop Algorithmic approach to evaluate marketing communication performance using variety of statistical or machine learning approachesPartner with domain knoledge experts to extract required communication history and results to create datasets approcpriate for advanced analyticsConduct EDA to evaluate data and understand associated business issues Additional responsibilities of the role include: Develop algorithmic approach to evaluate marketing communication performance using variety of statistical or machine learning approachesPartner with domain knowledge experts to extract required communication history and results to create dataset(s) appropriate for advanced analyticsConduct EDA to evaluate data and understand associated business issuesDevelop and present results to internal teams to evaluate alternative methodological approachesAssist in the deployment, evaluation, monitoring of results across products and clientsInteract with and support a variety of teams and individuals within the organization to make data-driven business decisions aimed at growth. Qualifications
